queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:jp_subscription_products` (`product_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `is_subscription` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', PRIMARY KEY (`product_id`)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:jp_subscription_products_descriptions` (`product_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'en', `price_prefix` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `price_suffix` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` mediumtext NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`product_id`,`lang_code`)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
